name: The Online Shop
description: An e-commerce shop that is built with React and tested with Vitest. It uses React Router, State, Portal, and other techniques to serve a robust client-side experience to the users.

name: Mini Message Board
description: A message board with a minimalistic design that comes with a backend. It is built by using the MVC pattern and Express.js. Database is supported by PostgreSQL.

name: Todo List
description: A todo list web app that is made with Vanilla JavaScript, CSS, and HTML. Files are bundled together with WebPack. No frameworks used, just frontend fundamentals.

name: Memory Card
description: A fun memory game made with the help of PokeAPI and React. Techniques used in this project include asynchronous fetching, State, Effect, etc.

name: Homepage
description: This website is built with the Responsive Design principles, aimed to support all screen sizes on different devices. Check it out on your phone and computer!

name: Tic Tac Toe
description: The classic Tic-Tac-Toe game but make it a web app version instead. This project is built in Vanilla JavaScript and CSS. Techniques include function scope and function factories in JavaScript.

name: Calculator
description: An online calculator that can perform basic arithmeticsâ€¦with a splash of colors. The purpose of this project is to demonstrate DOM and client-side event fundamentals.
